page.title: 10Gas comes to Melling.
page.content: Arkholme village has no main drains but it does have GAS! This is carried across the river to Melling but only to one road. People were asked if they were interested in having gas supplied and enough must have said yes. So in June yellow marks were painted on the main road and then came workmen,machines and piles of bright yellow pipes. Roadwork signs and traffic lights were put in place and the road machine began.As the pipes snaked along we waited longer at the lights. The houses beside the narrow road were full of dust and grit. The machine cut through both the electricity cables and water pipes. On two evenings the road was closed to traffic when they were digging along the narrowest part. The fee for connection will be 450 pounds.
